title: [Vornavis, Outlands Road]
description: Unshadowed by any trees, the moonlit expanse of the grassland spreads out in all directions.  As if intent on stealing any comfort from the setting, the unobstructed wind leeches the warmth from plant, animal and mineral alike, leaving behind only a gnawing chill.

Unshaded by any trees, the sunlit expanse of the grassland spreads out in all directions.  As if intent on stealing any comfort from the setting, the unobstructed wind leeches the warmth from plant, animal and mineral alike, leaving behind only a gnawing chill.
